title: Represent and analyze - 2nd system 4m 4k half A

content.description: A spring hangs vertically from a fixed support with a block attached to the springâ€™s bottom end. The block-spring system is set into oscillation with period <math alttext="T sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math> and maximum speed <math alttext="v sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>. The procedure is then repeated with a different spring and block. The second spring has four times the spring constant of the original spring, the second block has four times the mass of the original block, and the second block-spring system is set into oscillation with half the amplitude of the original system. How do the period and maximum speed of the second system compare to those of the original system?
